segments.text: I notice the sunlight streaming through the window, illuminating the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It casts a warm glow on the chaos, almost making it look normal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the overflowing sink is anything but normal; it sends a shiver down my spine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s oblivion to the water is infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t look happy or content; she just seems focused and unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks reckless, yet his excitement is infectious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at the sheer determination in his little face.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl, with her hopeful stance, completes the scene of innocent mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How could they possibly think this is okay?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could intervene, to save them from themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR
